text: if anybody has some sort of review on what leading, or even jsut recently popular candidates are for theories that might account for this and the recent LHCb measurements it would be hugely appreciated.  There's a dizzying plethora of theories that modify the lepton sector of course, but my instinct for which specifically are made more likely by recent news is quite poor
